group_1.narration: I heard it's called friendship chocolate.@The girls in class were talking about it.
I never thought that I could join in on @anything like that myself...

group_1.textCenter: Someone like me getting friendship@chocolate... [chara:100450:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100450:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy][chara:100450:cheek_0][chara:100450:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100450:lipSynch_1]Hee hee.
If no one else has any chocolate to @give out...
I could be the only one that's so excited@about this.
The girls at the villa would never make@me feel like that.
Everyone is so nice to me. I'm sure they'll@be happy if I give them chocolate.
(So, it makes me really happy that I can@think of them that way.)
